objects.text: • SUPER BREATHABLE MESH • SLIP-RESISTANT • ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT

product_details.description: Super Breathable Mesh Vamp: Lightweight, Soft, Comfortable, Wash resistance, They won't deform after clean the sneakers. Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe. Protect Your ankle: Slip-on ankle design allows you easily put on/off. Shoes's tongue and heels protect your feet from hurt in any activities. Provide more comfort. Slip-Resistance and Durable:Premium Hollow Blade Sole Offers Maximum Durability and Provides the Optimum Cushioning Performance that Creates a Slow Shock Jump, Soft, Comfortableand and Healthier Shoe Environment. Perfect choice to pair with any sport or casual assemble. Suitable for parties, casual, walking, running, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, exercise, workout and any occasion. Free Running: Stretch breathable mesh upper for ultra-lightweight support and breathability, springblade sole can superb energy return and durability, ensures your feet feel more freedom, allowing to move the way they were meant to, to enjoy the unparalleled pleasure of free running. Fabric type - Mesh ** Origin - Imported ** Sole material - Ethylene Vinyl Acetate ** Outer material - Mesh **

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a dynamic design for a modern slip-on walking shoe. The background features a deep radial gradient moving from dark gray to black, with circular stroke accents and subtle blue tech-inspired graphics for added depth. At the center is a sleek product image of black slip-on shoes, placed over a large concentric circle. The heading (`heading`) in a futuristic all-caps style sits top-center in white. Below it, the subheading (`subheading`) appears in blue to draw focus. A large circular badge contains the price (`price`) in bold white over vivid blue. At the bottom, informative features (`description`) are listed in clean white bullet points, followed by a rectangular CTA button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in blue with white text. 

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #121212 to #242424 (gradient)
- Blue: #0066FF (primary accent)
- Dark Blue: #003DA6 (gradient accent)
- White: #FFFFFF
- Gray: #444444 and #333333 (strokes and accents)
product_color: The product image features a dynamic and futuristic color palette dominated by **matte black (#000000)**, accented with **light gray (#D3D3D3)** and **white (#FFFFFF)** highlights. Black forms the base structure of the shoe, giving it a bold and aggressive look, while the light gray stripes and white logo details add contrast and draw attention to key design elements. The color blending emphasizes depth and texture, particularly in the intricate sole and mesh patterns. For an advertisement banner, combining a dark gradient background with splashes of silver or white can evoke a modern, high-performance aesthetic that mirrors the shoe's design.
